name: Clusterit
tagline: Configurable clustering feature proxy for PostGIS
body:
# Welcome to ClusterIt

This Python web app can be used to provide spatially clustered features encoded in GeoJSON format,
ready for consumption in OpenLayers or Leaflet for example.

## Installation

If you want to use the app, the easiest way is to use a python virtualenv, I recommend using 
virtualenvwrapper as it makes working with virtualenvs just so much easier:

```
$ mkvirtualenv clusterit
$ mkdir myclusterit
$ pip install clusterit
$ cd myclusterit
$ wget http://geospatial.io/clusterit/files/settings.py
```

Go ahead and make changes to the settings module to reflect your database.

```
$ export CLUSTERIT_SETTINGS_MODULE=settings
$ clusterit.py
```

Now head over to your browser and open http://localhost:5000 to get a overview page.
